protein.general_function: Involved in guanyl-nucleotide exchange factor activity
protein.specific_function: Functions as a guanine nucleotide exchange factor (GEF), which activates Rac1 and Rac3 Rho small GTPases by exchanging bound GDP for free GTP. Does not have a GEF activity for CDC42. Required for STMN1 'Ser-15' phosphorylation during axon formation and consequently for neuronal polarization

reference.reference_text: Watabe-Uchida M, John KA, Janas JA, Newey SE, Van Aelst L: The Rac activator DOCK7 regulates neuronal polarity through local phosphorylation of stathmin/Op18. Neuron. 2006 Sep 21;51(6):727-39.
